00038 Constant::Constant(m_value_type value)
00039     :value_(value)
00040 {
00041 }

00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00044 Constant* Constant::clone()
00045 {
00046     return new Constant(*this);
00047 }
00048 
00049 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00050 void Constant::setValue(m_value_type value)
00051 {
00052     value_ = value;
00053 }
00054 
00055 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00056 m_value_type Constant::getValue()
00057 {
00058     return value_;
00059 }
00060 
00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00062 Iterator<m_value_type> Constant::valueIterator()
00063 {
00064     return Iterator<m_value_type>(new ConstantIterator(value_,getSampleCount()));
00065 }
00066 
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00068 void Constant::scale(m_value_type factor)
00069 {
00070     value_ *= factor;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00075 m_value_type Constant::getMaxValue()
00076 {
00077     return value_;
00078 }

00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00085 Constant
00086     ::ConstantIterator
00087     ::ConstantIterator(m_value_type value, m_sample_count_type count)
00088     : value_(value), count_(count)
00089 {
00090 }
00091 
00092 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00093 Constant::ConstantIterator* Constant
00094     ::ConstantIterator
00095     ::clone()
00096 {
00097     return new ConstantIterator(value_, count_);
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00102 inline bool Constant
00103     ::ConstantIterator
00104     ::hasNext()
00105 {
00106     return (count_ > 0);
00107 }
00108 
00109 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00110 inline m_value_type& Constant
00111     ::ConstantIterator
00112     ::next()
00113 {
00114     count_--;
00115     return value_;
00116 }

00119 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00120 void Constant::xml_print( ofstream& xmlOutput )
00121 {
00122 
00123         xmlOutput << "\t\t\t\t<dv_type value=\"constant\" />" << endl;
00124         xmlOutput << "\t\t\t\t<duration value=\"" << getDuration() << "\" />" << endl;
00125         xmlOutput << "\t\t\t\t<rate value=\"" << getSamplingRate() << "\" />" << endl;
00126 
00127         //Print out private vars and collections for Constant here
00128         xmlOutput << "\t\t\t\t<value value=\"" << value_ << "\" />" << endl;
00129 
00130 }
00131 
00132 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00133 void Constant::xml_read(XmlReader::xmltag *constanttag)
00134 {
00135         char *value;
00136 
00137         if(value=constanttag->findChildParamValue("duration","value"))
00138                 setDuration(atof(value));
00139 
00140         if(value=constanttag->findChildParamValue("rate","value"))
00141                 setSamplingRate(atoi(value));
00142 
00143         if(value=constanttag->findChildParamValue("value","value"))
00144                 setValue(atof(value));
00145 }
00146 
00147 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00148 void Constant::xml_print( ofstream& xmlOutput, list<DynamicVariable*>& dynObjs )
00149 {
00150         xml_print( xmlOutput );
00151 }
